entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:06 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -34.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 9:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -34.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa steady
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -38.6°C
Wind: NNE 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Blizzard developing late this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 40 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending late in the morning then mainly sunny. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 40 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 58 in the morning and minus 51 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. Wind chill minus 51 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
